name: Drama Time
description:
Welcome to Drama Time!



You my dear are at the very top of my invitation list to my tea ceremony accompanied by the newest, the finest and the filthiest of the rumors and gossips we need to come to the bottom off. True or false.. have fun.

Your goal is to maintain the levels of fun, truth and drama, basically spread the drama among the royal family!
Imagine reigns but with a spin of drama in it. 

-

Team

Developer:
Rok kos

Art:
